item.title: IGF Student Showcase Winners
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Via Gamasutra, a gaming insider’s news site, 2006 IGF Student Showcase Winners Announced. Winning games will be featured at the 2006 GDC. You can try out many of the games yourself, like Cloud, a goofy flying game without orcs or … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded: Via Gamasutra, a gaming insider’s news site, 2006 IGF Student Showcase Winners Announced. Winning games will be featured at the 2006 GDC. You can try out many of the games yourself, like Cloud, a goofy flying game without orcs or superheroes. If I had to battle flying orc superheroes, then they’d really have something there!

item.title: GameSpy: Gamers’ Choice Voting
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: GameSpy’s Gamers’ Choice Voting: Game of the Year 2005. Get a GameSpy ID, go vote for Games of the Year, organized by platform and genre. Gee, wonder if Warcraft will win. (I don’t really wonder, I know it will win. … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded: GameSpy’s Gamers’ Choice Voting: Game of the Year 2005. Get a GameSpy ID, go vote for Games of the Year, organized by platform and genre. Gee, wonder if Warcraft will win. (I don’t really wonder, I know it will win. Derrr.)

item.title: 2006 Walk of Game
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Vote for 2006 Inductees for the Walk of Game — located in San Francisco, previous inductees include: Nolan Bushnell, Shigeru Miyamoto, Halo, Link (The Legend of Zelda), Mario, and Sonic The Hedgehog
item.content:encoded: Vote for 2006 Inductees for the Walk of Game — located in San Francisco, previous inductees include: Nolan Bushnell, Shigeru Miyamoto, Halo, Link (The Legend of Zelda), Mario, and Sonic The Hedgehog
